description:
To delete a team, the authenticated user must be a team maintainer or an owner of the org associated with the team.

If you are an organization owner and you pass the `hellcat-preview` media type, deleting a parent team will delete all of its child teams as well.

previews.name: hellcat
previews.note:
The Nested Teams API is currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2017-08-30-preview-nested-teams) for full details. To access the API, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.16/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.hellcat-preview+json

```
